game.name: Matt's Hidden Cats
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 꿈을 위해 동분서주하는 네 명의 야심찬 초짜 개발자들과 함께 84레벨 분량의 숨은그림찾기 대모험을 떠나보세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Go on a scavenger-hunt adventure that spans 84 hand-crafted levels, while getting to know the four friends who struggle to keep their video game studio together.
